page.title: 13METROPOLITAN POLICE, EDGWARE
page.content:
EDGWARE POLICE STATION 5 police officers are assigned to Edgware Police Station to deal with ordinary police business. The station is controlled from Wealdstone Police Station in "Q" Division. Because the building is large, but with a limited operational role, it is also used to store police records. About 230 people visit the station each day. 1 or 2 murders are reported to the station per year.
PUBLIC OPINION OF THE POLICE 7 people were interviewed on the subject. 5 of them said the police did an excellent job. The others (unemployed, black youths) said they thought the police were racially prejudiced. 1 interviewee singled out the speed with which complaints were dealt with for praise.
